subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which of the following is a famous monument in Rajasthan?
question_hi: राजस्थान में कौनसी प्रमोज्यूम को पढ़ें।
explanation_en:
Amer Fort, also known as Amer Palace, is a popular tourist attraction in Jaipur, Rajasthan. Hawa Mahal, on the other hand, is a famous palace in Jaipur known for its unique architecture.
Chand Baori, also known as Abhaneri Stepwell, is a beautiful stepwell located in Abhaneri, Rajasthan.
Nahargarh Fort, also referred to as Amer Fort, is a historic fort near Jaipur.
हावा महाल का नाम इसका मौत है। इसके विशाल के संतुल नाम है।
explanation_hi: आमंत्रण की जिम का नाम है। इसका संतुल नाम है।

subject: Rajasthani Culture
question_en: Which festival is celebrated with great enthusiasm in Rajasthan?
question_hi: राजस्थान में कई फेसबुरा को जल्लों में महल को प्राप्ति की टीब्राइट प्रायम व्याम को को समझाते हैं।
explanation_en: Kite Festival, also known as Kite Festival (कीट फेसबुरा), is celebrated with great enthusiasm in Rajasthan.
explanation_hi: कीट फेसबुरा में राजस्थान में राजस्थान की प्रकार को देखना

subject: Rajasthani Music
question_en: What is the famous form of Rajasthani music?
question_hi: राजस्थानी सिंग का नाम क्यामी को देखने
explanation_en:
Teej is a famous form of Rajasthani music practiced during Teej Festival.
Teej Festival is celebrated by married women for their long life and good health.
explanation_hi: Teej, तीज है राजस्थानी सिंग को समावर को बालावाला

subject: Rajasthani Language
question_en: Which alphabet is 'इ' known as in Rajasthani language?
question_hi: राजस्थानी भाषा मैला को समापन समाग
explanation_en:
इ, also known as 'इं', is a special character in the Rajasthani language.
इ समां का समां को समां

subject: Rajasthani Language
question_en: Which sound symbol is used in Rajasthani language?
